Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: SFT dataset generator for LLM routing

- Rules-based router with keyword matching for task classification
- Health checks for LM Studio models and Playwright tools
- Automatic fallback chains when primary model unavailable
- JSONL logging with user feedback collection (thumbs up/down)
- Session tracking for multi-turn conversations
- Pattern detection for systematic misroutings
- Metrics tracking with accuracy dashboard
- AI observer (gemma-3-1b) watches logs for insights
- Research agent generates daily analysis reports
- Low confidence prompts for high-value training data

Models: gpt-oss-20b (tools), qwen3-coder-30b (code), 
ministral-14b (reasoning), qwen3-vl-8b (vision), 
gemma-3n-e4b (chat), gemma-3-1b (simple/router target)

EOF
)")
